message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This is a good starting point, and we can adjust if needed.
Considering the inflation, I think 60/40 is a fair split. It's my turn, and I'm willing to take a bit more. Your turn!
Inflation is hitting us both hard. Let's split it evenly this time and call it a day.  It's the fairest way to go given the circumstances.
